scripts.dev-newtab:
tput setaf 3; echo 'Goto chrome://extensions -> load Unpacked -> ./Public -> hit refresh to reload extension after any changes 
'; tput sgr 0; rollup -c ./rollup.newtab.config.js -w
scripts.dev-popup:
tput setaf 3; echo 'Goto chrome://extensions -> load Unpacked -> ./Public -> hit refresh to reload extension after any changes 
'; tput sgr 0; rollup -c ./rollup.popup.config.js -w
scripts.dev-options:
tput setaf 3; echo 'Goto chrome://extensions -> load Unpacked -> ./Public -> hit refresh to reload extension after any changes 
'; tput sgr 0; rollup -c ./rollup.options.config.js -w
scripts.dev-all:
tput setaf 3; echo 'This might be slow and changes take 4-5 seconds to propagate 
Goto chrome://extensions -> load Unpacked -> ./Public -> hit refresh to reload extension after any changes 
'; tput sgr 0; watch 'npm run build'
